description: Tech industry jobs and layoffs claims (2023-2024)

cases.claim: Tech layoffs in 2023 exceeded 260,000 workers globally
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: Layoffs.fyi tracked 262,682 tech layoffs in 2023
Major rounds at Google (12K), Meta (10K), Amazon (18K)

cases.claim: Remote workers are 13% more productive than office workers
cases.label: INSUFFICIENT

evidence_packets.summary: Stanford study found 13% productivity gain for call-center workers
Microsoft survey shows 85% of managers distrust remote productivity

cases.claim: AI will replace 30% of current jobs by 2030
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: McKinsey estimates 12% of tasks, not jobs, may be automated by 2030
WEF Future of Jobs report predicts net positive job creation

cases.claim: Venture capital funding dropped 50% year-over-year in 2023
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: Global VC funding fell 49% to $285B in 2023 from $558B in 2022
Seed-stage funding remained relatively stable

cases.claim: Software engineer salaries declined by 10% in 2023
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: Levels.fyi data shows median comp flat or slightly up for senior roles
Entry-level offers dropped in some markets by 5-8%

cases.claim: Most Fortune 500 companies mandated full return to office by 2024
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: Only 18% of Fortune 500 require full-time office as of Q1 2024
Hybrid models adopted by 62% of large employers

cases.claim: Gig economy workers surpassed 70 million in the US
cases.label: INSUFFICIENT

evidence_packets.summary: BLS reports 57 million freelancers; definition varies widely
Upwork survey claims 64 million; methodology questioned

cases.claim: Meta's 2023 layoffs were primarily driven by Reality Labs losses
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: Zuckerberg cited 'Year of Efficiency' and pivoting resources
Reality Labs lost $16B in 2023, Zuckerberg acknowledged restructuring

cases.claim: Coding bootcamp graduates have 90% employment rates
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: CIRR data shows 60-75% placement within 180 days for audited bootcamps
Self-reported rates often exclude non-respondents, inflating figures

cases.claim: H1B visa workers depress wages for domestic tech workers
cases.label: INSUFFICIENT

evidence_packets.summary: NBER study found H1B workers complement rather than substitute domestic labor
EPI analysis argues H1B median wages are below market for comparable roles

cases.claim: Four-day work week trials showed no decline in productivity
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: UK pilot with 61 companies: revenue up 1.4% on average, no productivity loss
92% of participating firms chose to continue the four-day week

cases.claim: Over 50% of US workers are 'quiet quitting'
cases.label: INSUFFICIENT

evidence_packets.summary: Gallup finds 59% of workers globally are 'not engaged'
'Quiet quitting' definition varies; engagement != quitting

cases.claim: Tech hiring rebounded strongly in Q1 2024
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: CompTIA reports 150K tech job postings in January 2024, up 22% from Dec
AI/ML roles driving 40% of new postings

cases.claim: Tech worker unionization doubled from 2022 to 2023
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: NLRB filings in tech rose 15% but from a very low base
Total unionized tech workers remain under 1% of the sector

cases.claim: The share of women in tech roles decreased in 2023
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: Deloitte estimates women held 25.0% of tech roles in 2023, down from 25.7% in 2022
Layoffs disproportionately affected DEI and recruiting teams

cases.claim: Freelance developers earn 50% more per hour than salaried peers
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: A Cloud Guru survey shows freelance premium of 10-20% when accounting for benefits
Freelancers bear self-employment tax, health insurance, unpaid time between gigs

cases.claim: Tech worker burnout rates reached an all-time high in 2023
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: Blind survey: 73% of tech workers report burnout symptoms, up from 62% in 2022
WHO classification of burnout as occupational phenomenon gaining traction

cases.claim: Average tech tenure dropped below 2 years in 2023
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: LinkedIn data shows median tenure at 2.8 years in tech, down from 3.1
Layoffs inflated turnover statistics artificially

cases.claim: Demand for AI engineers grew 300% in 2023
cases.label: INSUFFICIENT

evidence_packets.summary: Indeed reports AI/ML job postings up 180% YoY
Many postings added 'AI' to title without changing role requirements

cases.claim: US tech outsourcing to India increased 40% in 2023
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: NASSCOM reports 38% growth in US-India tech services contracts
GCC (Global Capability Center) openings in India hit record 1,580 in 2023
